i18n.key: document title strictly for internal use, used for displaying the document in the Backoffice.
short title for navigation elements (menus, breadcrumb, etc. - 80 characters max.)
Full URL of the external page
Full title displayed in your browser's title bar (corresponds to the TITLE tag used for referencing).
description of the page for the search engines. Recommended size: between 160 and 180 characters. Place the most important keywords first.
The start publication date indicates the first date on which visitors will be able to view the page. Before this date, it will be impossible to view the page.
The end publication date indicates the latest date on which visitors will be able to view the page. After this date, it will be impossible to view the page.
When this option is set to ″No″, an internal URL redirecting to the external site will be generated.
